version.releaseNotes: - Try fixed behavior sdk reference to nuget package for UWP 10586.

- Added AddOrUpdateByKey and RemoveByKey to KeyedObservableCollection>TKey, TValue< - Removed ReactiveCommand.CanExecuteObserver property and added new method instead ReactiveCommand.ListenCanExecuteObservable(observable>bool<) - As Unity Finally updated it's released version, we go release.

- Added AddOrUpdateByKey and RemoveByKey to KeyedObservableCollection>TKey, TValue< - Removed ReactiveCommand.CanExecuteObserver property and added new method instead ReactiveCommand.ListenCanExecuteObservable(observable>bool<)
